title: Elise and Thresh don the Blood Moon mask

Nah, but Blood Moon {{champion:154}} would mean a green blob with a red mask, and it just doesnt fit. Maybe Blood Moon {{champion:238}} might be nice as he already covers his face so a mask could fit.
Just my suggestions :)

Imo Zed was never much of a conformist. He's the kind of person who would being in groups and organisations. After all, he was shunned by his superiors. I get the vibe his character doesn't like other people, which is understandable. Having blood-moon ties with other champs & ninjas... I don't think it suits his character, as cool as it might look.

Because there are already two ninjas who are Blood Moon. The whole point is that you have a team. A well rounded team.

Can't  have two assassins who are exactly the same in the one team.
And having more than one assassin on the same team lowers the base heath for them by a little for every extra assassin

if more than one ninja is present on the team, each ninja will lose 1 health for every additional ninja on the team.
E.G. if Shen, Kennen, Akali & Zed are all on the same team they would each lose 3 base health..... not exactly noticeable even at lvl 1...
I know right

Guys thresh and elise had the same amount of skins as zed until these two came out. Quit complaining and be grateful to riot.
